data.title: Camera Corner World Premiere MADE Tickets Are On Sale!
data.meta_description: Camera Corner will have its world premiere at the MADE Bike Show Movie Night on Friday, August 23rd. We recommend buying your tickets ahead of time as this show will sell out and there are no guarantees you'll be able to get in the…
data.text:
Camera Corner will have its world premiere at the MADE Bike Show Movie Night on Friday, August 23rd. It will screen at 8 PM at the Zidell Yards in Portland, Oregon, and your entry to the film is free if you have a MADE ticket for Friday. Otherwise, it’s $10. Yakima is sponsoring the movie night and We Are One is buying the first 400 beers for the evening events. Do not miss out!

We recommend buying your tickets ahead of time as this show will sell out and there are no guarantees you’ll be able to get in the night of. You can buy tickets at MADE.

Read on for more information about 2024 MADE.

Building on the success of the inaugural 2023 MADE bike show and MADE Australia, MADE 2024 will bring together over 200 builders and exhibitors from around the globe, creating the world’s largest gathering of builders and the public. The confirmed list of builders will be announced soon.

MADE 2024:

Dates: August 23 – 25, 2024

Location: Zidell Yards, Portland, Ore.

200+ builders and supporting brands

Evening activations supported by Chris King, Shimano, and Yakima

Iconic covered venue with indoor and outdoor expo space

Elevator Coffee provided by Shimano

Cold treats provided by ENVE

Sparkling water provided by Campagnolo

Beer garden supported by Block 15 Brewing

Multiple food and beverage options on-site, with many more in walking distance of the venue

Additional details:

Single- and multi-day tickets available

On-site parking is available with ticket purchase

On-site bike parking

Public transit: Zidell Yards is a half-block away from a bike-specific bridge and directly on the waterfront bike path.

Multiple train and bus options are less than a block away
